channel.title: Log4j Exploitability Index
channel.description: Recent content on Log4j Exploitability Index

item.title: Yahoo Vespa
item.description: Community Resources Resource Link source https://blog.vespa.ai/log4j-vulnerability/ Community Notes Source Note NCSC-NL Your Vespa application may still be affected if log4j is included in your application package Sources Date Attribution Description 2021-12-13 11:13:47 NCSC-NL Updated communityNotVulnerable. Updated community link source. Updated community note.

item.title: Yellowfin Yellowfin
item.description: Community Resources Resource Link source https://community.yellowfinbi.com/announcement/notice-critical-vulnerability-in-log4j2 Community Notes Source Note NCSC-NL v7 and v6 releases are not affected unless you have manually upgraded to Log4j2 Sources Date Attribution Description 2021-12-15 9:31:14 NCSC-NL Updated vendorPatchExists. Updated community link source. Updated community note.

item.title: Yenlo Connext
item.description: Community Resources Resource Link source https://www.yenlo.com/news/vulnerability-code-log4shell-log4j2 Community Notes Source Note NCSC-NL Connext Platform (Managed WSO2 Cloud) and all underlying middleware components are not vulnerable Sources Date Attribution Description 2021-12-17 6:31:53 NCSC-NL Updated communityNotVulnerable. Updated community link source. Updated community note.

item.title: Zabbix
item.description: Vendor Resources Resource Link Zabbix Log4j https://blog.zabbix.com/zabbix-not-affected-by-the-log4j-exploit/17873/ Sources Date Attribution Description 2021-12-17 14:04:59 CISAGov Updated vendor link Zabbix Log4j.

item.title: Zabbix Zabbix
item.description: Community Resources Resource Link source https://blog.zabbix.com/zabbix-not-affected-by-the-log4j-exploit/17873/ Community Notes Source Note NCSC-NL Zabbix is aware of this vulnerability, has completed verification, and can conclude that the only product where we use Java is Zabbix Java Gateway, which does not utilize the log4j library, thereby is not impacted by this vulnerability. Sources Date Attribution Description 2021-12-13 13:38:50 NCSC-NL Updated communityNotVulnerable.

item.title: Zammad Zammad

item.title: Zendesk All Products
item.description: Vendor Resources Resource Link 2021-12-13 Security Advisory - Apache Log4j (CVE-2021-44228) https://support.zendesk.com/hc/en-us/articles/4413583476122 Community Notes Source Note CISAGov Zendesk products are all cloud-based; thus there are no updates for the customers to install as the company is working on patching their infrastructure and systems. CISAGov Last Update: 12/13/2021 Sources Date Attribution Description 2021-12-17 14:04:59 CISAGov Updated communityVulnerable.
